snippet.title: Borg longplay and disk drive sound (Apple II - Sirius)
snippet.description:
Borg (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/borg) was an action game published by Sirius software in 1981 for the Apple ][. The game uses half track copy protection from track $1.5 to track $B.5, which you can hear in the boot sequence with the Borg jumping up and down. Hope you enjoy the longplay!

PS: The # of lives is stored at address $23CB and you can get infinite lives by changing $11E4 from CE to AD

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Disk image - 4AM
